TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DbConnectionStringBuilder extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IDictionary, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor
Public Class DbConnectionStringBuilder Implements ICustomTypeDescriptor, IDictionary

summary.span: 提供強類型連接字串產生器的基底類別。

span.span: Provides a base class for strongly typed connection string builders.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供的強型別的連接字串產生器的基底類別 (，等等) 衍生。The class provides the base class from which the strongly typed connection string builders (, , and so on) derive. 連接字串產生器可讓開發人員以程式設計方式建立語法正確的連接字串，以及剖析和重建現有的連接字串。The connection string builders let developers programmatically create syntactically correct connection strings, and parse and rebuild existing connection strings. 已定義資料庫無從驗證的方式。The has been defined in a database-agnostic manner. 由於新增命名空間中，開發人員需要針對它們進行程式設計，才能建立連接字串可以處理的任意資料庫對基底類別。Because of the addition of the namespace, developers require a base class against which they can program in order to build connection strings that can work against an arbitrary database. 因此，類別可讓使用者指定任意索引鍵/值組，並將產生的連接字串傳遞給強型別提供者。Therefore, the class lets users assign arbitrary key/value pairs and pass the resulting connection string to a strongly typed provider. .NET Framework 的一部分的所有資料提供者都提供強類型的類別繼承自: ， ， ，和。All the data providers that are included as part of the .NET Framework provide a strongly typed class that inherits from : , , , and . 開發人員可以建置、 指派，並編輯任何任意的提供者的連接字串。The developer can build, assign, and edit connection strings for any arbitrary provider. 對於支援特定的索引鍵/值組的提供者，連接字串產生器提供強型別的屬性對應到已知組。For providers that support specific key/value pairs, the connection string builder provides strongly typed properties corresponding to the known pairs. 為了支援需要能夠支援未知的值的提供者，開發人員也可以提供任意索引鍵/值組。In order to support providers that require the ability to support unknown values, developers can also supply arbitrary key/value pairs. 類別會實作 介面。The class implements the interface. 這表示類別可與 Visual Studio 設計工具在設計階段。This means that the class works with Visual Studio designers at design time. 當開發人員使用設計工具來建立強型別資料集和強型別在 Visual Studio 中的連接時，強型別的連接字串產生器類別會顯示它的型別相關聯的屬性，也會有轉換器，可以對應的一般已知索引鍵的值。When developers use the designer to build strongly typed DataSets and strongly typed connections within Visual Studio, the strongly typed connection string builder class will display the properties associated with its type and will also have converters that can map common values for known keys. 必須建立連接字串，可以使用應用程式一部分的開發人員類別或其中一個來建立和修改連接字串，其強型別衍生項目。Developers needing to create connection strings as part of applications can use the class or one of its strongly typed derivatives to build and modify connection strings. 類別也可讓您輕鬆管理儲存在應用程式組態檔中的連接字串。The class also makes it easy to manage connection strings stored in an application configuration file. 開發人員可以建立連接字串使用強型別的連接字串產生器類別，或者也可以使用類別。Developers can create connection strings using either a strongly typed connection string builder class, or they can use the class. 不會執行檢查有效的索引鍵/值組。The performs no checks for valid key/value pairs. 因此，可能可以使用這個類別建立無效的連接字串。Therefore, it is possible using this class to create invalid connection strings. 支援只有索引鍵/值組所支援的 SQL Server，則嘗試加入無效組會擲回例外狀況。The supports only key/value pairs that are supported by SQL Server; trying to add invalid pairs will throw an exception. 這兩個方法和屬性控制代碼嘗試插入惡意的項目。Both the method and property handle tries to insert malicious entries. 例如，下列程式碼正確逸出巢狀索引鍵/值組：For example, the following code correctly escapes the nested key/value pair: ```vb Dim builder As New System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder builder("Data Source") = "(local)" builder("integrated sSecurity") = True builder("Initial Catalog") = "AdventureWorks;NewValue=Bad" ``` ```csharp System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder builder = new System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder(); builder["Data Source"] = "(local)"; builder["integrated Security"] = true; builder["Initial Catalog"] = "AdventureWorks;NewValue=Bad"; ``` 結果是以安全方式處理無效值的下列連接字串：The result is the following connection string that handles the invalid value in a safe manner: ``` data source=(local);integrated security=True; initial catalog="AdventureWorks;NewValue=Bad" ``` ## Examples 下列主控台應用程式會建立兩個連接字串，一個用於 Microsoft Jet 資料庫，一個用於[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]資料庫。The following console application builds two connection strings, one for a Microsoft Jet database, and one for a [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] database. 在各案例中，程式碼會使用泛型類別建立連接字串，然後傳遞屬性強類型連接類別的建構函式的執行個體。In each case, the code uses a generic class to create the connection string, and then passes the property of the instance to the constructor of the strongly type connection class. 這不是必要的。程式碼可能也已建立個別的強型別的連接字串產生器執行個體。This is not required; the code could also have created individual strongly typed connection string builder instances. 此範例也會剖析現有的連接字串，並示範操作連接字串內容的各種方式。The example also parses an existing connection string, and demonstrates various ways of manipulating the connection string's contents. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, optionally using ODBC rules for quoting values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`useOdbcRules`是`true`，這個引號 （周圍使用括號 （{}） 的值） 的值使用 ODBC 規則。If `useOdbcRules` is `true`, this uses ODBC rules for quoting values (surrounding values with curly braces ({})). 如果`useOdbcRules`是`false`，這個使用引號字元 ("") 來分隔的值。If `useOdbcRules` is `false`, this uses quotation mark character ("") to delimit values.

summary.span: 將有指定索引鍵和數值的項目加入 。

span.span: Adds an entry with the specified key and value into the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性也可用來加入新項目不存在的索引鍵的值設定在字典中。The property can also be used to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the dictionary. 例如：`myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`。For example: `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`. 呼叫藉由傳遞 null 值的方法 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic) 索引鍵會擲回。Calling the method by passing a null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) key throws an . 不過，呼叫藉由傳遞 null 值的方法中移除索引鍵/值組。However, calling the method by passing a null value removes the key/value pair. ## Examples 下列範例會建立新，並將項目。The following example creates a new and adds items. 程式碼也示範如何覆寫現有的項目使用方法，並包含會擲回的註解的區塊。The code also demonstrates overwriting an existing item using the method, and includes a commented block that would throw an . > [!NOTE] > 這個範例包含了密碼，可示範 如何搭配連接字串使用。This example includes a password to demonstrate how works with connection strings. 我們建議在您的應用程式中使用 Windows 驗證。In your applications, we recommend that you use Windows Authentication. 如果您必須使用密碼，請勿在您的應用程式中包含硬式編碼的密碼。If you must use a password, do not include a hard-coded password in your application. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.Add#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.Add/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.Add#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.Add/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 提供有效且安全的方法，將索引鍵和值附加至現有的 物件。

span.span: Provides an efficient and safe way to append a key and value to an existing object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可讓開發人員使用建立能夠充分利用功能中包含的索引鍵/值組的集合類別加入索引鍵/值組，而不需要建立的負擔時，維護執行個體。This method allows developers using a to create a collection of key/value pairs to be able to take advantage of the features included in the class when you add key/value pairs, without having to incur the overhead of creating and maintaining a instance. `AppendKeyValuePair`方法格式正確的索引鍵和值，並將新的字串加入至提供。The `AppendKeyValuePair` method formats the key and value correctly and adds the new string to the supplied . ## Examples 如果某些處理程序已建立的連接字串，但現在應用程式必須執行簡單的修改，該連接字串，可能會更有效率，只要加入索引鍵/值組使用物件。If some process has created a connection string, but now an application must perform a simple modification to that connection string, it may be more efficient to just add the key/value pair using a object. 而不是建立新，開發人員可以呼叫`AppendKeyValuePair`方法，傳入，其中包含提供的連接字串。Instead of creating a new , developers can call the `AppendKeyValuePair` method, passing in a that contains the supplied connection string. 下列程序示範此技術的簡單範例。The following procedure shows a simple example of this technique. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.AppendKeyValuePair#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.AppendKeyValuePair/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.AppendKeyValuePair#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.AppendKeyValuePair/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 提供有效且安全的方法，將索引鍵和值附加至現有的 物件。

span.span: Provides an efficient and safe way to append a key and value to an existing object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可讓開發人員使用建立能夠充分利用功能中包含的索引鍵/值組的集合類別加入索引鍵/值組，而不需要建立的負擔時，維護執行個體。This method allows developers using a to create a collection of key/value pairs to be able to take advantage of the features included in the class when adding key/value pairs, without having to incur the overhead of creating and maintaining a instance. `AppendKeyValuePair`方法格式正確的索引鍵和值，並將新的字串加入至提供。The `AppendKeyValuePair` method formats the key and value correctly and adds the new string to the supplied . 雖然大部分的資料來源可讓您使用引號分隔欄位，ODBC 不支援-如 ODBC 連接字串，您必須使用大括號 （{}）。Although most data sources let you delimit fields by using quotation marks, ODBC does not--for ODBC connection strings, you must use curly braces ({}). 若會使用 ODBC 規則來分隔欄位，設定`useOdbcRules`參數`true`。In order to have the use ODBC rules for delimiting fields, set the `useOdbcRules` parameter to `true`. ## Examples 如果某些處理程序已建立的連接字串，但現在應用程式必須執行簡單的修改，該連接字串，可能會更有效率，只要加入索引鍵/值組使用物件。If some process has created a connection string, but now an application must perform a simple modification to that connection string, it might be more efficient to just add the key/value pair using a object. 而不是建立新，開發人員可以呼叫`AppendKeyValuePair`方法，傳入，其中包含提供的連接字串。Instead of creating a new , developers can call the `AppendKeyValuePair` method, passing in a that contains the supplied connection string. 下列程序會示範這項技巧，使用 ODBC 規則的值用引號括住的簡單範例。The following procedure shows a simple example of this technique, using ODBC rules for quoting values. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.AppendKeyValuePair#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.AppendKeyValuePair/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.AppendKeyValuePair#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.AppendKeyValuePair/VB/source.vb#1)]

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 開發人員建立設計工具，可以善用類別必須要能夠讓可見或不可見的設計工具屬性方格內的連接字串。Developers creating designers that take advantage of the class must be able to make the connection string visible or invisible within the designer's property grid. 屬性可讓開發人員表示屬性應該不可見的屬性設定為`false`。The property lets developers indicate that the property should be invisible by setting the property to `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會移除所有索引鍵/值配對並重設所有對應的屬性。The method removes all key/value pairs from the and resets all corresponding properties. 這包括設定屬性設為 0 和屬性設為空字串。This includes setting the property to 0 and the property to an empty string.

MemberSignature.Value: public string ConnectionString { get; set; }
.property instance string ConnectionString
Public Property ConnectionString As String
public: property System::String ^ ConnectionString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定與 相關聯的連接字串。

span.span: Gets or sets the connection string associated with the .

value.span: 從包含於 的索引鍵/值組所建立的目前連接字串。

span.span: The current connection string, created from the key/value pairs that are contained within the .
The default value is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會傳回儲存在所維護的集合內的索引鍵/值組的分號分隔清單。This property returns a semicolon-delimited list of key/value pairs stored within the collection maintained by the . 每個配對包含索引鍵和值，以等號分隔。Each pair contains the key and value, separated by an equal sign. 下列範例說明一般連接字串。The following example illustrates a typical connection string. ``` "Persist Security Info=False;Integrated Security=SSPI;Initial Catalog=AdventureWorks;Data Source=(local)" ``` 資料提供者可能會預期特定索引鍵和每個連接字串屬性的值。Data providers may expect specific keys and values for each connection string property. 這些值個別記錄。, These values are documented individually. 類別不會驗證其連接字串，與相關聯的索引鍵/值組，雖然可以從它繼承的類別。The class does not validate the key/value pairs associated with its connection string, although classes that inherit from it can. 屬性類別通常做為建立的機制，並以等號分隔，剖析的索引鍵/值組的分號分隔清單。The property of the class acts generally as a mechanism for creating and parsing semicolon-delimited lists of key/value pairs separated with equal signs. 它會提供任何驗證或其他特定的連接字串的支援人員。It provides no validation or other support specific to connection strings. 如果您將項目加入集合，屬性會反映這些變更。If you add items to the collection, the property will reflect the changes. 如果您指派值給屬性，會嘗試剖析值，並使用分號和等號分隔符號。If you assign a value to the property, the will try to parse the value, using the semicolon and equal-sign delimiters. ## Examples 下列範例將示範可能的行為的屬性。The following example demonstrates possible behaviors of the property. 範例：The example: - 加入空的索引鍵/值組，一次建立連接字串。Creates a connection string by adding key/value pairs, one at a time, to an empty . - 將完整的連線字串來指派屬性執行個體，並修改字串內的單一的索引鍵/值組。Assigns a complete connection string to the property of the instance, and modifies a single key/value pair within the string. - 指派要的索引鍵/值組的任意組屬性 （也就是字串不是從遠端類似連接字串的任何項目），並修改其中一個值。Assigns an arbitrary set of key/value pairs to the property (that is, a string that is not anything remotely like a connection string), and modifies one of the values. - 指派無效的連接字串屬性，以示範會擲回的例外狀況。Assigns an invalid connection string to the property, demonstrating the exception that is thrown. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例包含了密碼，可示範 如何搭配連接字串使用。This example includes a password to demonstrate how works with connection strings. 我們建議在您的應用程式中使用 Windows 驗證。In your applications, we recommend that you use Windows Authentication. 如果您必須使用密碼，請勿在您的應用程式中包含硬式編碼的密碼。If you must use a password, do not include a hard-coded password in your application. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 已提供無效的連接字串引數。

span.span: An invalid connection string argument has been supplied.

remarks.format: ## Examples [!code-csharp[DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.ContainsKey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.ContainsKey/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.ContainsKey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.ContainsKey/VB/source.vb#1)] 此程式碼會產生下列輸出：This code produces the following output: ``` Contents of the DbConnectionStringBuilder: provider="Provider=Microsoft.Jet.OLEDB.4.0";data source=C:\MyExcel.xls;extended properties="Excel 8.0;HDR=Yes;IMEX=1" The collection contains the key "Data Source". ```

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool EquivalentTo (System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder connectionStringBuilder);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool EquivalentTo(class System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder connectionStringBuilder) cil managed
Public Overridable Function EquivalentTo (connectionStringBuilder As DbConnectionStringBuilder) As Boolean
public: virtual bool EquivalentTo(System::Data::Common::DbConnectionStringBuilder ^ connectionStringBuilder);

param.name: connectionStringBuilder
param.span: 要與這個 物件比較的 。

span.span: The to be compared with this object.

summary.span: 比較在這個 物件中的連接資訊和提供之物件中的連接資訊。

span.span: Compares the connection information in this object with the connection information in the supplied object.

returns.span: 如果這兩個 物件中的連接資訊會產生相等的連接字串，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the connection information in both of the objects causes an equivalent connection string; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 比較索引鍵名稱不區分大小寫。值比較會區分大小寫。Comparisons on key names are case insensitive; value comparisons are case sensitive. 方法會傳回`true`如果索引鍵/值組相等，不論其順序。The method returns `true` if the key/value pairs are equal, regardless of their order. 連接行為的兩個連接字串相等，因為順序就永遠不會在連接字串中很重要。The connection behavior of the two connection strings are equivalent, because order is never significant within connection strings. 不過，不同的順序可能會影響連接共用行為的這些連接字串為基礎的連接。However, different order may affect connection pooling behavior of connections based on these connection strings. ## Examples [!code-csharp[DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.EquivalentTo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.EquivalentTo/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.EquivalentTo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.EquivalentTo/VB/source.vb#1)] 這個範例會顯示下列輸出：This sample displays the following output: ``` builder1 = value1=SomeValue;value2=20;value3=30;value4=40 builder2 = value2=20;value3=30;value4=40;value1=SomeValue builder3 = value2=20;value3=30;value4=40;value1=SOMEVALUE builder1.EquivalentTo(builder2) = True builder2.EquivalentTo(builder3) = False ```

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool IsFixedSize { get; }
.property instance bool IsFixedSize
Public Overridable ReadOnly Property IsFixedSize As Boolean
public: virtual property bool IsFixedSize { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出 是否有固定的大小。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the has a fixed size.

value.span: 如果 有固定大小，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the has a fixed size; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 固定大小的集合不允許加入或移除項目之後，在集合建立後，但允許修改現有的項目。A fixed-size collection does not allow adding or removing elements after the collection is created, but it does allow modifying existing elements. 固定大小的集合是只包裝函式加入和移除項目; 不會與集合因此，如果變更基礎的集合，包括新增或移除項目，固定大小的集合會反映這些變更。A fixed-size collection is just a collection with a wrapper that prevents adding and removing elements; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, including adding or removing elements, the fixed-size collection reflects those changes.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsReadOnly { get; }
.property instance bool IsReadOnly
Public ReadOnly Property IsReadOnly As Boolean
public: property bool IsReadOnly { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示 是否為唯讀。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the is read-only.

value.span: 如果 是唯讀，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the is read-only; otherwise .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 加入、 移除或修改項目集合建立後唯讀的集合不允許。A read-only collection does not allow adding, removing, or modifying elements after the collection is created. 唯讀的集合是只含可防止修改集合的包裝函式的集合因此，如果基礎集合進行變更，唯讀的集合會反映這些變更。A read-only collection is just a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您設定這個屬性，如果字典中已經存在指定的索引鍵時，就會取代值;否則，會建立新的項目。When you set this property, if the specified key already exists in the dictionary, the value is replaced; otherwise, a new element is created. ## Examples 下列主控台應用程式建立新並將索引鍵/值組加入其連接字串，使用屬性。The following console application creates a new and adds key/value pairs to its connection string, using the property. MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Collections.ICollection Keys { get; }
.property instance class System.Collections.ICollection Keys
Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Keys As ICollection
public: virtual property System::Collections::ICollection ^ Keys { System::Collections::ICollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 中包含索引鍵的 。

span.span: Gets an that contains the keys in the .
An that contains the keys in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然 中值的順序並未指定，但此順序會與 屬性傳回之 中關聯值的順序相同。The order of the values in the is unspecified, but it is the same order as the associated values in the returned by the property. 傳回不是靜態的複本; 相反地，中原始的索引鍵是指回。The returned is not a static copy; instead, the refers back to the keys in the original . 因此，變更為會反映在。Therefore, changes to the are reflected in the . ## Examples 下列主控台應用程式範例會建立新，並將某些索引鍵。The following console application example creates a new , and adds some keys. 此程式碼迴圈傳回屬性顯示索引鍵/值組，並將新的金鑰。The code loops through the returned by the property displaying the key/value pairs, and then adds a new key. 因為屬性會傳回動態，第二個迴圈會顯示所有的索引鍵/值組，包括最新的項目。Because the property returns a dynamic , the second loop displays all the key/value pairs, including the newest item. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.Keys#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.Keys/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.Keys#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.Keys/VB/source.vb#1)]

param.span: 要擷取之項目的索引鍵。

param.span: 對應至「索引鍵」的值。

summary.span: 從這個 擷取對應到所提供之索引鍵的值。

span.span: Retrieves a value corresponding to the supplied key from this .

returns.span: 如果在連接字串中找到 ，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if was found within the connection string, otherwise.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓開發人員安全地擷取值，以從而不需要先呼叫方法。The method lets developers safely retrieve a value from a without needing to first call the method. 因為不會引發例外狀況呼叫時，不存在的機碼中傳遞，您不必先擷取其值尋找索引鍵。Because does not raise an exception when you call it, passing in a nonexistent key, you do not have to look for a key before retrieving its value. 呼叫具有不存在的索引鍵會將 null 值 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) 中`value`參數。Calling with a nonexistent key will place the null value (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) in the `value` parameter. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫方法，示範數個可能的結果。The following example calls the method, demonstrating several possible outcomes. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.TryGetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.TryGetValue/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.TryGetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.TryGetValue/VB/source.vb#1)] 此範例會顯示下列結果：The sample displays the following results: ``` Provider=sqloledb DATA SOURCE=192.168.168.1,1433 Unable to retrieve value for //InvalidKey// Unable to retrieve value for null key. ```

exception.span: 包含 null 值 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )。

span.span: contains a null value ( in Visual Basic).

summary.span: 取得包含 中之值的 。

span.span: Gets an that contains the values in the .
An that contains the values in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中值的順序並未指定，但它是關聯的索引鍵中的相同順序傳回方法。The order of the values in the is unspecified, but it is the same order as the associated keys in the returned by the method. 傳回不是靜態的複本; 相反地，中原始的值是指回。The returned is not a static copy; instead, the refers back to the values in the original . 因此，變更為會反映在。Therefore, changes to the are reflected in the . ## Examples > [!NOTE] > 這個範例包含了密碼，可示範 如何搭配連接字串使用。This example includes a password to demonstrate how works with connection strings. 我們建議在您的應用程式中使用 Windows 驗證。In your applications, we recommend that you use Windows Authentication. 如果您必須使用密碼，請勿在您的應用程式中包含硬式編碼的密碼。If you must use a password, do not include a hard-coded password in your application. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.Values#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.Values/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.Values#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DbConnectionStringBuilder.Values/VB/source.vb#1)] 會顯示下列輸出：Displays the following output: ``` MSDataShape.1 false MSDAORA orac username ******* ```
